965280.name: Masters of Puzzle - Halloween Edition: Chess on Halloween Eve
965280.description:
The illustration Chess on Halloween Eve is our two-piece debut of the Bulgarian illustrator Stanislav Karmashikov. This puzzle box is part of our special Halloween Edition series and will be released during our Halloween 2018 event. We hope you will appreciate the fun and very unique art, the great illustration, and have a great time building this puzzle in all the available variations.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Halloween Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, and 2000 puzzle tiles. The HD image is the original digital illustration as provided by the author and provides a good level of detail. The puzzle is not too challenging to build, even though it has several background areas that might take you longer. Overall, there are many and very unique details that can be assembled relatively easily even on large tileset configurations. It's very suitable for beginners.
965280.supported_languages: 英语, 保加利亚语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 德语
